TokenDistribution.title: Token Distribution
TokenDistribution.content: 800mil tokens upfront, minting gradually in coming 10+ years and capped at 2bil. 1bil tokens rewarded to creators by proof of creativitiy

jacky-chu.title: Jacky Chu
jacky-chu.subtitle: Early investor of BTC, ETH, IOTA, VEN and ARDR

alex-lau.title: Alex Lau
alex-lau.description: Blockchain Open Source Advisor of CyberMiles, Webank and TruBuzz; R&D Engineering Consultant of SUSE Linux Enterprise Storage

haggen-so.title: Dr. Haggen So
haggen-so.description: Founder and President of Hong Kong Creative Open Technology Association; Project Manager of the Creative Commons

jon-phillips.title: Jon Phillips
jon-phillips.description: Founder of Openclipart; Developer of Inkscape; Founder of Qi Hardware.

isaac-mao.title: Isaac Mao
isaac-mao.description: Founder of Musicoin; Founder of CNBlogs.org; Project Lead of iCommons China, Creative Commons China Team.

VerifiyEmail.subject: Verify your like.co email
VerifiyEmail.body:
Hi {{name}}!

Welcome to like.co! To verify your email, click the following link:
https://like.co/verify/{{uuid}}?ref={{ref}}

VerifiyAndCouponEmail.subject: Verify your like.co email and claim your LikeCoin
VerifiyAndCouponEmail.body:
Hi {{name}}!

Welcome to like.co! To verify your email and receive red pocket, click the following link:
https://like.co/verify/{{uuid}}/{{coupon}}?ref={{ref}}

Your coupon code: {{coupon}}

preSaleEmail.subject: You have successfully joined LikeCoin early-bird presale
preSaleEmail.body:
Hi {{name}}!

Thank you for joining LikeCoin early-bird presale!

After we have confirmed your payment of {{eth}} ETH, you will receive {{base}} + {{bonus}} LikeCoin when our public sale starts.

Transaction URL:
https://etherscan.io/tx/{{txHash}}

Meanwhile, you can participate in our Affiliate Program to earn extra LikeCoin!

Feel free to contact us on our official website should you have any thoughts or question.

label.visit: Visit our website for more information:

content.switchRinkeby: like.co requires Rinkeby to work. Please switch to the correct network.
content.switchMain: like.co requires Main to work. Please switch to the correct network.
content.web3:
like.co requires Metamask to work. Please switch to Chrome and install Metamask extension.
Remember to keep your seed words safe!
content.locked: like.co requires Metamask to work. Please unlock your Metamask.
content.sign: Please click Sign on Metamask to continue.
content.connectledger:
Please connect and unlock your Ledger wallet, then switch to Ethereum app. The Browser support mode in Ethereum app must be YES to use like.co.
For more information, please visit Ledger support
content.signledger: Please press confirm on Ledger wallet to continue.

label.hardwareWallet: ... or connect to a hardware wallet

chrome.title: Desktop Chrome required
chrome.content:
like.co require a browser that support ETH wallet extension MetaMask.
Please switch to desktop Chrome then install MetaMask plugin.

label.confirmToClaim: Are you sure you want to claim {value} LikeCoin?

label.waiting: Waiting for the blockchain to confirm. It may take a few minutes depends on network traffic. Meanwhile you may browse around like.co
label.newUser: Seems you don’t have a LikeCoin ID. Create now.

blocker.title: Processing...
blocker.content: Processing your request, please do not close the browser

emailInput.title: Please Verify your email
emailInput.content: Please provide and verify your email.
emailInput.label: Your email address

header.title: Create a LikeCoin ID to send and receive LikeCoin
header.titleReferral: Join {name} and Create a LikeCoin ID
header.content: Great! Seems you already have Metamask installed. Now you are ready to receive or send LikeCoin.

label.validCodeRequired: Please enter a valid coupon code

referral.title: Affiliate Program
referral.description: You and your friend can both earn a LikeCoin coupon when you successfully invite a friend to sign up using your affiliate link. Please note that your friend's account email needs to be verified for you and your friend to earn the coupons.
referral.verifyEmailFirst: Verify your email to join the affiliate program.
referral.tweetContent: Join me now on Like.co and receive your free LikeCoin!
referral.ogDescription: Rewarding contents by proof of creativity. Join {name} and register now!

label.referral: as part of the affiliate program, you will receive an email with LikeCoin coupon

label.preSaleDescription1: LikeCoin will be sent to your wallet when public sale start.
label.tokensaleBadAmount: Invalid amount, minimum 0.1 ETH, and less than 10,000 ETH
label.bonusLockUp: The bonus LikeCoin will be lock up in your wallet and cannot be transferred for 6 months.
label.amountWillBeSentWhenSalesStart: The purchased and bonus LikeCoin will be sent to your wallet when public token sales starts, expected to be April 23 2018. The bonus LikeCoin will be lock up in your wallet and cannot be transferred for 6 months.
